participant_2.background:

I enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners.

i like to watch tv.
i listen to a fall out boy record every day.

content.text: Hi there, what is your favorite band?
Hey, my favorite band is Fall Out Boy. What about you?
My favorite band is Bon Jovi. Did you know that I made my first movie when I was 18?
Wow, that is really cool! What was the movie about?
It was a short film about a group of friends who go on an adventure. It was a lot of fun to make.
That sounds really interesting. I would love to see it if you ever post it online.
I will definitely let you know if I do. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, watch TV, and hang out with my friends. I am also a hard worker who enjoys being active, but struggles with weight loss.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do a lot of the same things. I also enjoy archery. I was born completely deaf, but that doesn't stop me from pursuing my hobbies.
That is really cool! I have never met anyone who is deaf before. How did you learn archery?
I took some lessons when I was younger. I also have a hearing dog who helps me out a lot.
That is awesome! I am glad that you were able to find a way to pursue your hobbies.
Thank you! I am glad too. I think it is important to find things that you enjoy doing, regardless of your circumstances.
